content:
We would like to get feedback on the mechanism for an EBRS to access the live birth and fetal death information. It has been suggested that querying the EHR would be the best way to accomplish this.
We have edited the scenarios to reflect this and have added "alternate" scenarios to also represent a PUSH mechanism.

Feedback on query vs push (both?) would be much appreciated either here or come to the session on Friday, Sept 11th, 2020 10:00 AM-11:30 AM: https://whova.com/portal/webapp/hlfhi_202009/Agenda/1212530
